title: Chapter 1363 - Long Planned
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1363 - Long Planned

The atmosphere was stifled and silent.

Su Yi could tell at a glance what Li Zhong was thinking. He said, “I have a score to settle with the Yun Family. If you don’t know what happened…”

Before he could finish, Li Zhong felt a massive weight lift from his shoulders. “Fellow Daoist, please, rest assured. I understand what’s important.”

Yun Changhong and the other Yun clansmen’s hearts sank. There was no doubt about it; they couldn’t count on Li Zhong helping them.

Meanwhile, Su Yi turned his attention toward Luo Xiaoyun.

Luo Xiaoyun felt a chill course through his heart. “What do you want to do?”

“I’ll send you on your way first,” Su Yi said calmly.

Kcch!!

A streak of sword qi exploded into being, soaring into the sky and transforming into a waterfall-like downpour of sword rain. 

As the rain enveloped Luo Xiaoyun, the obscure, mysterious image of the Six Paths of Reincarnation appeared within it.

Luo Xiaoyun’s hair stood on end. He immediately unleashed his killer weapon.

Boom!

A nine-floored treasure pagoda appeared before him. Immortal light poured from it, creating a multi-layered curtain of light, the outlines of entire worlds. They wrapped defensively around Luo...
